message.content: Yes, the authors mentioned that they will release all their data and software, providing a GitHub repository link (github.com/serre-lab/Meta-predictor). This allows other researchers to reproduce the main experimental results and encourages the adoption of their approach for evaluating explainability methods.

Yes, the authors mention that they are releasing all their data and software. Although the exact URL is not provided in the text, they refer to their GitHub repository (github.com/serre-lab/Meta-predictor), which implies that the code, data, and instructions for reproducing the main experimental results should be available there.

Yes, the authors mention that they are releasing all their data and software, and they provide a URL (github.com/serre-lab/Meta-predictor). This indicates that the required code, data, and instructions for reproducing the main experimental results are provided or accessible.
